Sip Sip Somm SOMM | Wine Bar At SOMM - Wine Bar, we take pride in providing our valued patrons with an exceptional range of delectable cheese and sumptuous charcuterie options at incredibly reasonable prices. Come taste the difference for yourself at our restaurant. menu our drinks Finally, a place for wine lovers Savor the rich and complex flavors of our carefully curated wine selection. drinks Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google Mick: five star review by Had a great afternoon at Somm- wonderful hospitality and comfort while the ladies and gents drank their pink wine and wine flights. Local IPA was great, but IPA from MI was slightly oxidized - though a wonderful option on the menu to try. Lovely outdoor patio. Inside felt like you are drinking with friends in your living room. Great staff, can't wait to come back. Review by - Google Brad: five star review by This is a really enjoyable place to enjoy a glass of wine. The meat and cheese boards are really great for the price and are beautifully decorated. The variety of wine is quite expansive, and staff knowledge is always helpful. There are so many different sitting areas including couches, patio areas, bar, and cafe tables. Taking a bottle to go is also great when we find a wine we like! Review by - Google Christae: five star review by We enjoyed our time here. We stopped by after dinner and immediately loved the atmosphere. We were immediately greeted and was able to choose our seating. We told our server our typical wine choice and he recommended two that we purchased and loved. It was quiet (but not too quiet) and a great date night stop. I even appreciated the clean restroom with a hook for my purse. I noted the female sanitary products in the bathroom. It's the little things üòâ A must visit! Review by - Google Annie: five star review by Amaaaazing wine bar nestled in Johns Island. There was a pop up winemaker from South Africa the evening I visited. He came around and poured the wines and told us about each. Super cool experience. Additionally the owner was incredibly educated on all things wine/cheese and made the best recommendations. This place is a must visit! Availability and spots are limited. JHOOK1025@GMAIL.COM Can I purchase Wine Club wines without joining a club? No. Wine Club wines are offered exclusively to members at prices that can't be beat. What if I miss pickup day? No worries! We will hold your wine until you're able to pick it up. Can I bring a plus one to Wine Club pickup? Yes! A plus one is included. Additional guests can join at $30/person. FIND US EVERYWHERE @SOMMCHS
